raw_body: NITA IRANDA DISSANAYAKE. It is with great sadness that we announce the death of NITA IRANDA DISSANAYAKE,​ wife of the late Wilfred Dissanayake,​ beloved mother of Anoja,​ Roshini & Parakrama,​ mother-in-law of Noble,​ Anil and Anoma,​ sister of late Nedra and of Salmala,​ grandmother of Natasha,​ Dasni,​ Savani,​ Avindra,​ Tivanka and Nanditaa,​ great grandmother of Shalom and Jevik. Remains lie at 127/​1,​ Old Road,​ Nawala for viewing on Monday,​ 15th January 2024 from 10 a.m. onwards. Cortege leaves residence on same day at 3.30 p.m. for cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella.003809
